definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: One of the favored methods for protein-structure determination is X-ray crystallography .
sentences.chinese: 射線結晶學是一種極受歡迎的蛋白質機構測定方法。

sentences.english: In the science of crystallography it is crucial, as it is also in many aspects of chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 在結晶學科學或是化學方面更扮演關鍵的角色。
